titleStmt.title: Sanskrit Manuscripts in the Bodleian Libraries

layout.p: X lines per page, approximately X akṣaras per line.
Impressed marginal frame lines, no ruling.

handNote.desc: Bengali in black ink (main text and first set of annotations).
Bengali in red ink (second set of annotations?).

item.add: Invocation (śrī) immediately before the foliation, mid right margin, verso.

Numerous annotations on all margins throughout the manuscript; the first set in black ink was probably written by the scribe of the main text, while the second set in red ink might have been added later.

history.provenance: Donated by Prof E.H. Johnston in February 1940; previously belonged to Evans-Wentz, W.Y. Dr. W.Y. Evans-Wentz.

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card, for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Libraries' Admissions Office.

change.persName: Camillo Formigatti modified this entry according to the https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bodleian/consolidated-tei-schema/master/msdesc.rng

msHeading.title: Daśavaikālikasūtra
msHeading.author: Śayyaṃbhavasūri, father of Managa (Manaka) for whom he composed this work .
msHeading.note: .This wowrk is five fold Ms. Blank space is left in center of folio and both the margins andfol.1B - 2A is filled with red circles. Daṇḍas with red. Script is clear.

msItem.incipit: Text Begins On folio No.1B Withoṃ namo vītarāgāyaI dhammo-maṅgalam-ukkiṭṭhaṃ ahiṃsā-sañjamo-tavo devā vi taṃ namaṃsanti jassa dhamme sayā-maṇo I1I jahā dumassa puṣpesu bhamaro āviyai rasaṃ ..etc

[Comm. of Text on fol.1B] oṃ arhaṃ I dhammo maṅgalam ukkaṭṭhaṃ dharmma utkṛṣṭa maṅgalaṃ ahiṃsā-sañjamo-tavo ahiṃsā-sañjamas-tapaḥ tatra ahiṃsā-jīvadayā-saṃyama pañcendriya nigrahaḥ tapo dvādaśādhī devā vi taṃ namaṃsanti devā api taṃ namasyati ....etc
[1st Cūlikā Text Begins on Fol. 51A - last line] iha khalu bho! pavvaieṇaṃ uppanna dukheṇaṃ sañjame arai-samāvanna vitteṇaṃ uhāṇuppehiṇā aṇohāipaṇaveva I1I ....etc

[Comm. of 1st Cūlikā on fol.51A - left margin +21 Vss.] atha śrīSīmandharoktānāvat mṛṇāṃ madhyān dvi-cūlike śrīsaṅghanā u granthā tenya madhyāt āddhya cūlikāyā saṃbandhā lagyate I prāgrukta guṇopi sādhuḥ kadāpi karmma-vaśya .....etc

[2nd Cūlikā Text Begins on Fol.54B - 2nd line] cūliyaṃ tu pavakhāmi suyaṃ kevali-bhāsiyaṃ jaṃ suṇittu supunnāṇaṃ dhamme uppajjaī maī I1I aṇuṇusoya paṭṭhie bahu-jaṇaṃmi paḍisoya laddha lakheṇaṃ paḍisoyam eva appā-doyavvo hou kāmeṇaṃ I2I

[2nd Culika Comm.begins on Fol. 54B right margin - 4th line] dvitīya cūlā prārabhyate I prathama cūlāyāṃ asyṃ dvitīya cūlikāyāṃ vi vakta caryā-uvyate cūliyaṃ tu paevakhāmi śrutaṃ vakṣyāmi kevali bhāsiyaṃ śrīSīmandharasvāmi bhāṣitaṃ jaṃ suṇitu supunnāṇa I4I ...etc
msItem.explicit: Text Ends On folio No. 51A - +20 Vss. withtaṃ deha-vāsaṃ asuī asāsayaṃ sayā cae nicca-hiyaṭṭhiyappā cchidittu jāī maraṇassa bandhaṇaṃ uvei bhikhū aṇuṇāgamaṃ gaiṃ I ttibemi I Sabhikhū nāma dasamaṃ ajjhayaṇaṃ sammattaṃ I cha I

[Comm.Ends on fol.51A - left margin - 3rd line] chinditusya jāī-maraṇassa bandhaṇaṃ chitvā jati-maraṇasya janma-maraṇasya bandhana ka(r)ma-jālaṃ uvei-upaiti prāpnoti bhikṣuḥ sadhu anuṇāgamaṃ gaiṃ punarāgamāṃ gatiṃ siddhiṃ ttibemi iti samāpto bruvīmi I 21 I Sabhikṣunām adhyayanaṃ samāptaṃ I

[1st Cūlikā Text ends on fol.53B - +17 Vss.with] icceva saṃpassia buddhimaṃ naro, āyaṃ uvāyaṃ vivihaṃ viyāṇiyā, kāeṇa vāyā adrumāṇaseṇaṃ, tigutti-gutto jiṇa-vayaṇam-ahiṭṭhijjāsi Ittibemi I I 18 I .raivakkā nāmaṃ paḍhamākṣaṃ cūlā sammattā I cha I

[1st Cūlikā Comm.ENds on fol.54B - Upper part of text -4th line]jina-vacanaṃ jino'padeśa adhitiṣṭena sa sādhuḥ prākṛtvādva ca navyatpayaḥ Ittibemi I itti samāptā bravīmi I18 I rativākyā nāma prathama cūlā samāptā I

[2nd Cūlikā Text ends on fol.56B +15 vss.] appā hu khslu samayaṃ rakhiyavvo savvi-diehiṃ susamāhiehiṃ arakhiujjāipahaṃ uvei surakhiu savva-duhāṇam uccaī ttibemi I16 I bīyā cūlā sammattā Icha I sijjaṃ-bhavaṃ gaṇaharaṃ jiṇa-paḍimā-dansaṇeṇa paḍibuddhaṃ Maṇaaga-piyaraṃ Dasakāliyassa ijjūūagaṃ vsnde I 1 I Maṇaga pahucca Sijjaṃbhaveṇa sijjuhiyā dasa-jjhayaṇā veyāliyāi ṭhaviyā tamhā Veyāliyaṃ nāma I 2 I dasa-ajjhayaṇa-sameyaṃ Sijjaṃbhava-sūri-viraiyaṃ eyaṃ lahuyāupattināu aṭṭhā Maṇaga-sīsassa I 3 I cchamāsehi ahīyaṃ ajjhayaṇamiṇaṃ tu ajja-Maṇageṇa, chammāsā pariyāu aha-kāla-gau samāhī I 4 I āṇanda-asupāyaṃ kāsī rājassa Bhaddassa ya pucchā kahaṇā ya viyālsṇā saṅghe I 5 I tamhā risā-vipurisā jai vihurajjanti daḍha so paṇatākathha ciraṃ-hohī dhīrattam aṇindayaṃ bhavaṇe I 6 I tayā do-cūlāu āṇīyā Jakhie-ajjāe Sīmandhara-pāsāu bhaviyāṇa-vibohaṇa-ṭṭhāe I 7 I Dssaveyāliyaṃ sammattaṃ I cha I

[2nd Cūlikā Comm.ends on fol. 56B -lower part of text +4 Vss.] āṇanda asupāyaṃ kāsī sijjaṃ bhavātahiṃ therīra-mānasikebhyām ukhyate śiva-padaṃ upaiti ttibemi iti samāpto bravīmi I 16 I iti dvitīyā cūlā samāptā iti śrīDaśavaikā Avacūriḥ I cha (3times) I
msItem.colophon: .saṃvat 1595 varṣe Caitra sudi 15 Guruvāre likhitaṃ I cha I śubhaṃ bhavatuḥ I kalyāṇam astuḥ i cha (5times) I maṅgalaṃ astuḥ I śrī I cha I
